title: As a Zed main, Zed needs to be removed.
body:
This toxic champion has plagued the rift for far too long and should have left with all the elo he stole. There is absolutely no skill in facerolling your keyboard and winning the game because of it. There shouldn't be a champion based on how many times you can slap your dick on your keyboard and oneshot people.
Players would no longer use freelo Zed to outplay and require actual skill.

Former Zed main here. Why former? Because I don't want fucking people to hate me. Seriously that shit has to be nerfed ASAP.

- Why the hell on this world Zed can have infinite range on second part of his R?
- Why the hell can Zed have similar clear as Xerath while being melee AD assassin?
- Why the hell does Zed's passive works on minions? So that even a braindead can easily lasthit without any effort?

How to make Zed perfectly balanced?

1. Remove his passive against minions so he's forced to CS like every other assassin or melee AD champ.

2. Give him a fucking range on the second part of his R. Range should be exactly the same as the range of Nocturne's lvl 1 ultimate or even slightly less.

3. Reduce the AD scalings on his E against the minions so he cant clear better than Orianna.

With those Nerfs you won't nerf his assassination potentiall but you will actually nerf his safety and easy 300 minions at 35 min mark. LoL.

I think that a lower blink time for his R could do wonders, as currently Zed can dive and deal his damage and shrug most CC because it will end and he will go back to safety.

Also, delete his base damage on R but increase the damage done scaling. That way it cant be used as an easy and safe last hit.
The only time that is not true is when a freelo Zed player tries to ult Malzahar near his tower, then Malz and the tower give Zed a stern 'talking to'.

NEW PASSIVE: Zed has the le escapes. deal damage, build small ad items e.g.{{item:3035}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3153}}and still pop squishies. QSS? dont worry use your broken kit to come up to them. Slap them with that "Shredder's Blade" a few times, ignite, E, and Q. BAM DEAD ADC. APC have Zanyas? Well if you ult, dw press R again and you are safe. Wanna split? go ahead, who the f*ck in his right mind would come stop you, BUT OH WAIT!! WE GOT THE MUTHA FUCKIN GOON SQUAD!!!! Well you are fucked by then. 

So this is your passive. Read it and realize how good Le Zed is. Why do you need 6%/8%/10% maximum health in magic damage when they are low when you can kill them without it? The main reason this "New Passive" is here is to remind you what Zed is. Kappa

I say Zed just needs to have his passive only work against champions. Also, make him unable to recast his ult (blink back to the cast spot) until after the mark is triggered. This way he actually has to put himself in some type of danger rather than Ulting using his combo until he sees the mark then blinking back to R and waiting for the $$$.

Taking away the indicator that tells you your opponent will die from death mark would also be a thought.
